summary.span: Implementazione del provider CMK Store per l'uso di provider CSP (Cryptographic Service Provider) basati su Microsoft CAPI con [Always Encrypted](/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/always-encrypted-database-engine).

span.span: The CMK Store provider implementation for using Microsoft CAPI based Cryptographic Service Providers (CSP) with [Always Encrypted](/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/always-encrypted-database-engine).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Abilita l'archiviazione delle chiavi di chiave master della colonna Always Encrypted in un archivio, ad esempio un hardware il modulo di protezione (HSM), che supporta Microsoft CAPI basato Cryptographic Service Provider (CSP).Enables storing Always Encrypted column master key keys in a store, such as a hardware security module (HSM), that supports the Microsoft CAPI based Cryptographic Service Providers (CSP).

span.span: Always Encrypted Blog
Always Encrypted (client development)
